casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Mayhew D. WATSON, Jr., a/k/a Mayhew D. Watson, Defendant-Petitioner. C-92 September Term 2018
080857 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 28, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001645-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
